analysis.description: CryptoRomeAuction._isContract (/unique_chucks/15/0x13c8a7817ab3e74c28f5ef0eb7d7a3bdb329c2a0.sol#99-104) is declared view but contains assembly code

ERC721 (/unique_chucks/15/0x13c8a7817ab3e74c28f5ef0eb7d7a3bdb329c2a0.sol#28-40) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/15/0x13c8a7817ab3e74c28f5ef0eb7d7a3bdb329c2a0.sol#33-34)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/15/0x13c8a7817ab3e74c28f5ef0eb7d7a3bdb329c2a0.sol#34-35)

Wonder (/unique_chucks/15/0x13c8a7817ab3e74c28f5ef0eb7d7a3bdb329c2a0.sol#137-328) has incorrect ERC20 function interface(s):
	-transfer (/unique_chucks/15/0x13c8a7817ab3e74c28f5ef0eb7d7a3bdb329c2a0.sol#258-266)
	-approve (/unique_chucks/15/0x13c8a7817ab3e74c28f5ef0eb7d7a3bdb329c2a0.sol#269-274)

Wonder.onlyOwnerOf (/unique_chucks/15/0x13c8a7817ab3e74c28f5ef0eb7d7a3bdb329c2a0.sol#157-161) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- require(bool)(wonderIndexToOwner[_tokenId] == msg.sender)
	- require(bool)(wonderIndexToOwner[_tokenId] == msg.sender)

Wonder.ownerOf.owner (local variable @ /unique_chucks/15/0x13c8a7817ab3e74c28f5ef0eb7d7a3bdb329c2a0.sol#293) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner (state variable @ /unique_chucks/15/0x13c8a7817ab3e74c28f5ef0eb7d7a3bdb329c2a0.sol#4-5)

Wonder.takeOwnership.owner (local variable @ /unique_chucks/15/0x13c8a7817ab3e74c28f5ef0eb7d7a3bdb329c2a0.sol#285) shadows:
	- Ownable.owner (state variable @ /unique_chucks/15/0x13c8a7817ab3e74c28f5ef0eb7d7a3bdb329c2a0.sol#4-5)

	- Ownable.owner (state variable @ /unique_chucks/15/0x13c8a7817ab3e74c28f5ef0eb7d7a3bdb329c2a0.sol#4-5)
